name: OP Allocations
content: Overview of OP Allocations in the Collective Ecosystem

steps.name: Ecosystem Fund
steps.content: The Ecosystem Fund is an incentive program created to stimulate the development of the Collective ecosystem. This fund is designed to directly support the communities and companies, known as OPCOs, that drive the expansion of the Collective ecosystem. The allocation dedicated to the Ecosystem Fund will be divided into different categories. The Ecosystem Fund is intended to be a kick-starting mechanism that will eventually be phased out once the OP in the fund has been depleted. 25% of the OP tokens are allocated to this fund.

steps.name: Air Drops
steps.content: The Optimism Foundation aims to attract users from both the Optimism and Ethereum communities through the distribution of OP tokens. This distribution occurs in multiple waves, with the first wave being Airdrop #1. Airdrop #1 was designed to distribute OP to over 250k addresses. To ensure fairness, the eligibility criteria for this airdrop can be found in the Airdrop #1 documentation. Additionally, 14% of the OP token supply will be reserved for future user airdrops.

steps.name: RetroPGF
steps.content: The objective of RetroPGF is to ensure that all OPCOs are adequately rewarded based on their impact to the Collective. The Optimism Foundation may tap into the 20% RetroPGF Reserve to increase the total OP payout of any given period. An allocation of 8.8% of the OP token supply will be held in reserve for future programs, to be determined by the Foundation and/or the governance community. Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RetroPGF) will be distributed by the Citizens' House, with rounds expected to occur quarterly.

steps.name: Contributors & Sugar Xaddies
steps.content: 19% of the tokens will be distributed to core contributors who are the individuals who played a crucial role in bringing Optimism and the Optimism Collective from concept to reality. These tokens will also continue to support the development of the protocol whereas Sugar Xaddies who are the investors will receive 17% of OP tokens.

choices.content: To distribute OP tokens to users from both the Optimism and Ethereum communities
To reserve OP tokens for future programs to be determined by the Foundation and/or the governance community
To directly support the communities and companies driving the expansion of the Collective ecosystem
To distribute OP tokens to over 250k addresses through Airdrop #1

stepItems.content: What is the purpose of the Ecosystem Fund?
stepItems.explanation: The Ecosystem Fund is an incentive program created to stimulate the development of the Collective ecosystem by directly supporting the communities and companies driving its expansion.
